architectural_notes: Deployment/publish requires a valid domain slug: 5–50 characters; letters, numbers, and hyphens only.
known_issues: Cannot publish due to invalid domain name containing disallowed characters/length; needs a valid slug based on 'ip look up' (e.g., ip-look-up).

existing_features.title: Update the app’s publish/deployment domain (slug) to a valid value derived from the requested name “ip look up” that satisfies the platform rules (5–50 characters; letters, numbers, and hyphens only). Use: "ip-look-up".
